title: Zodiac Compatibility: What Signs Are Best with Earth Signs?

steps.title: Taurus:
steps.content: Taurus: This earth sign is ruled by Venus, so you enjoy the finer things in life. In addition to being one of the most sensual signs, you're practical. You know how to get what you want! It's not surprising then that you're the most compatible with another Taurus. [1] X Research source You also make a great team or partnership with Capricorn since that sign is good at strategizing. Virgo is your other matchâ€”they can nurture and support your love of food.

steps.title: Virgo:
steps.content: Virgo: This earth sign is ruled by Mercury, so you're governed by logic and communication. You're honest, helpful, and great at organizing. [2] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. In fact, a lack of planning and spontaneity can drive you a little crazy. You're most compatible with other Virgos since you show affection by actions, not words. You can also make a relationship work really well with Taurus or Capricorn since either of these signs makes a great team.

steps.title: Capricorn:
steps.content: Capricorn: This earth sign is ruled by Saturn, so you're prepared to take on life. This doesn't mean you're an idealist or optimist. It just means that you're practical about what you want. Capricorns aren't an overly expressive or romantic sign, so a relationship with another Capricorn might be the best for you. [3] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021. Again, Capricorn personalities work well with Taurus or Virgo. These are both supportive, logistical types that will value your level-headed approach to life and relationships.

steps.title: Water signs do a good job of nourishing and balancing earth signs.
steps.content: Water signs do a good job of nourishing and balancing earth signs. Although water signs are more in touch with their emotions and more flexible, they can encourage earth signs to slow down and go with the flow. Just as water is vital to the earth, these signs can support earth signs. [4] X Research source Water signs include Cancer, Scorpio, and Pisces. These relationships sometimes run into trouble if the water sign pushes the Earth sign to confront their emotions. An earth sign might think the water sign is being too dramatic and this can lead to conflict.

steps.title: Earth signs and air signs can work well as long as they're on the same page.
steps.content: Earth signs and air signs can work well as long as they're on the same page. Air signs are dreamers, so they're often not practical enough for earth signs. However, the match can work if the air sign realizes that the earth sign can help them realize their ideas. Earth signs enjoy getting ideas and concepts from air signs. [5] X Research source Air signs include Gemini, Libra, and Aquarius. The relationship runs into trouble if the air sign isn't steady or stable enough for the earth sign's liking. They can also have a hard time communicating since the air sign might overthink or not share their thoughts.

steps.title: Earth signs and fire signs make a challenging, but potentially exciting match.
steps.content: Earth signs and fire signs make a challenging, but potentially exciting match. Earth signs can easily become stuck in their ways, but partnering with a fire sign can liven things up! Even though they're complete opposites, an earth-fire relationship can provide a balance that works. Fire signs include Aries, Leo, and Sagittarius. This relationship works as long as both sides are interested. If the passion dies, these signs don't have enough in common to make the relationship work.
